title: HELP!!! Login Error
body: Whenever I try to log into league it tells me that the login server isn't responding. I've tried googling a fix but nothing seems to work! Anyone else have this problem or have any solutions?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me and let me know if that helps.
Already done this, I have windows 10 but was able to follow the windows 8 instructions fine. It's still not working :/

Are you able to access [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) site fine? If not then your DNS entries are still screwy.

Could you run [netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and post a link to your results page here.
